name: Cucumber Orange Carrot Juice
author: mamicha
summary: This is a delicious juice my husband and I make for breakfast or an after-meal dessert when guests are over. It's not only delicious, but will perk up any bad day with a boost of vitamins and nutrients that you may otherwise skip out on. I hope you try it, and enjoy! Recipe makes 2 tall glasses or 4 smaller glasses of juice. You need a blender.
ingredients: ½ cup water, or as needed
¼ cup white sugar, or to taste
directions: Peel orange and save a 1x1-inch piece of the peel
Place orange, orange peel piece, carrots, and cucumber in a blender; pour in water
Blend until desired consistency is reached; add sugar and lemon juice
